title: only one down to riot employee i have encountered
body: Joe Pewzor - only riot employee that i would trust my support ticket with, only guy that i reckon you could have a convosation with, the rest sound like they are computer generated when they speak. so just a huge shout out to Joe Pewzor for being my favourite riot employee

replies.body: Most of them just copy paste and don't read it, luckily they usually pass me on to a guy who knows what he's talking about, where as my friend always gets a copy paste reply that contradicts and doesn't answer the question
Everyone will give you a copy and pasted response.

nah this guy actually had fun, back in the day my name was DontGetPwned and stuff happen and he was like oh i guess you got owned >:D and was joking around and was heaps cool about it while the others just gave me a copy and paste response as you stated. ONLY GOOD RIOT EMPLOYEE SO FAR.

I just saw this 2 years after I left Riot. #feelsbadman 

Thank you so much for the kind words. It really means a lot to me even now after 2 years has passed. XD

nice, but do you really think it's worthy of a thread?

jk most threads are a joke anyways

i just wanted to let him know that I'm glad to know that there is one guy out there that isn't a complete drone and actually understands the player and helps and can joke around. maybe its not worth a thread but hey, they crap thats on here now isn't much better tbh..
